messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Old Bridge, please. There's a shooting.
Where are they shooting at?
Route 9 and Old Bridge. At the Pathmark.
Okay, ma'am, I need you to calm down and tell me your exact location. Are you at a store?
Yes, I'm in the back room of the Pathmark. We locked ourselves in.
Alright, do you know if anybody is hurt right now?
No, I don’t know. We are just hiding.
Okay. Do you have any cameras or anything where you can see what's going on?
No, we don't.
What back room are you locked in right now?
In the middle of the back room. Please hurry.
Okay, I got everyone coming. Just try to relax for me, alright? You're locked in the room, right?
Yes, but they can get in. They have guns.
Alright, I'm going to put you on hold for one second, please don't hang up, okay?
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, hello, my daughter works at the Pathmark overnight. There's a shooting.
Do you know if anybody's hurt, ma'am?
I don't know.
Okay, we've got people on the way. Thank you.
Thank you.
911, what's your emergency?
I'm at the Old Bridge Pathmark. Someone has a shotgun, and he's tearing the place apart.
Is anyone hurt?
I don't know. We all ran out of the store.
Is he still in the store?
Yes, his name is Terrence.
What is he wearing? Is he a black male, white male?
A black male, former Marine, wearing a bulletproof vest.
Please stay calm. We've got everyone on the way. How many people do you think are in the store?
About 15 or 16.
Okay, do you know exactly where he was when you left the store?
He was at the front door when I left.
Alright, how do you know Terrence?
He works at Pathmark. He just went postal.
Okay, you're safe now? Are you far from the building?
Yes, we're in the parking lot.
Alright, try to stay hidden and safe. We are sending help as quickly as possible.
Okay, thank you.
Can you see if anyone is injured?
I don't know, I've been running and hiding.
Alright, do not go back. Just stay safe.
911, what's your emergency?
My daughter is in the Pathmark. She just called saying someone is shooting.
Okay. We already have help on the way.
Alright. Thank you.
911, what's your emergency?
I'm still inside the Pathmark. I'm in the back room hiding.
Are you okay? Do you see the shooter?
No, I'm hiding. Please hurry.
We have officers on the way. Stay hidden and quiet.
Okay. He's a black guy, short, wearing a white t-shirt, dark pants.
Alright, stay hidden. Help is on the way.
Thank you.
911, what's your emergency?
There's gunshots at Old Bridge Pathmark.
Are you safe? Can you see the shooter?
No. I'm hiding in the back room.
Stay where you are. Help is coming.
Oh God. I hear more shots.
Okay, stay hidden. Do not move.
I think he's coming here.
Try to stay as quiet as possible.
Please hurry.
We're doing everything we can. Stay where you are, please.
Okay, thank you.
